subject: Business
title: Co-Founder Dynamics
description: A micro-lesson that makes Co-Founder Dynamics usable.

hook.text: Jobs and Wozniak built Apple. Then Jobs forced Wozniak out. Co-founder splits are brutal.

buildup.text: About 65% of startups fail due to co-founder conflict, per Harvard Business School.

discovery.text: The best pairings combine complementary skills: one builds, one sells, one strategizes.

twist.text: Friends make risky co-founders if they can't have hard conversations about money and control.

climax.text: Y Combinator recommends a co-founder prenup â€” a written agreement on roles, equity, and exits.

punchline.text: Choose a co-founder like a marriage. The divorce costs the same.
